@Test
public void test11() {

  long start = System.currentTimeMillis();
  int a = 0;
  for(int i=0;i<1000000000;i++){
      try {
          a++;
      }catch (Exception e){
          e.printStackTrace();
      }
  }
  long useTime = System.currentTimeMillis()-start;
  System.out.println("useTime:"+useTime);
}

Lcfi2:

movl %edi, -4(%rbp)

popq %rbp

.globl _main

## BB#0:

Lcfi5:

movl $1, %edi
movl $2, %esi

callq _add_a_b
addq $16, %rsp
popq %rbp
retq
.cfi_endproc
